title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Look at them, they're dead"
description: This story goes all the way back to Sammy's early days in the Rampers. He and his fellow Rampers associate, Joe Vitale, get wrapped up in a car chase and bullets start flying. With both of them shot, it's a miracle they make it out alive.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: This story goes all the way back to Sammy's early days in the Rampers. He and his fellow Rampers associate, Joe Vitale, get wrapped up in a car chase and bullets start flying. With both of them shot, it's a miracle they make it out alive.
